json_to_edit.voice_over: One mural can spark a thousand revolutions.
json_to_edit.description: Zephyr creates a powerful graffiti mural that ignites a city-wide uprising.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant sirens, spray paint hiss, footsteps
json_to_edit.name: The Art of Revolution
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A street artist's graffiti inspires a city-wide revolution.

qa.action: Zephyr approaches a large, blank wall in an abandoned warehouse district.

hf.action: Zephyr's hand shakes a spray paint can, preparing to start the mural.

tr.action: Zephyr begins painting, movements fluid and purposeful.

xc.action: Time-lapse of the mural coming to life, depicting a powerful image of rebellion.

ka.action: Zephyr's determined eyes as they add final touches to the mural.

fn.action: A small crowd gathers, staring in awe at the completed mural.

af.action: People take photos and share the mural on social media.

qo.action: Montage of the mural going viral on various social media platforms.

fp.action: A large crowd marches through the city streets, inspired by the mural.

va.action: Zephyr watches from afar, a mix of pride and apprehension on their face.

edit_command: Add three new shots showing the authorities' reaction to the growing revolution.

hf.action: Zephyr's hand shakes a spray paint can, preparing to start the mural.

bx.action: Police officers huddle around monitors, watching live feeds of the growing protests.

yz.action: Aerial view of police vehicles converging on the protest area.

lm.action: A stern-faced police chief issues orders, his eyes reflecting the gravity of the situation.

label.rationale: we can add three new shots to show the authorities' reaction to the growing revolution. this will add depth to the scene and show the consequences of zephyr's mural. we'll add these shots after the existing ones, maintaining the current flow of the scene while introducing the new element of authority response. we'll need to update the number_of_shots from 10 to 13, add three new shots to the shots dictionary, and update the list_display_order accordingly.
